Set 3: Creating a Community and Building Advocacy

As mentioned earlier, customers need to be coaxed into adopting new technologies. One way to achieve this is by creating a community of early adopters who can become advocates for the product. These advocates can then help to spread the word about the product to their friends, family, and colleagues.

To create a community around the new headset, Apple can start by identifying potential early adopters who are passionate about technology and are likely to be interested in the new product. This can be done through targeted marketing campaigns on social media and other online channels, as well as through partnerships with tech influencers and bloggers.
